org.smartfrog.services.xunit.listeners
Interface TestIndex

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
HtmlTestIndex, XmlTestIndex
All Known Implementing Classes:
HtmlTestIndexImpl, XmlTestIndexImpl
public interface TestIndex
extends java.rmi.Remote

This interface is what index components implement to get told of tests to index

Method Summary
 void testSuiteStarted(TestSuite suite, java.lang.String hostname, java.lang.String processname, java.lang.String suitename, long timestamp, TestListener listener, java.io.File filename)
          notify indexer that a test suite has started
 

Method Detail

testSuiteStarted

void testSuiteStarted(TestSuite suite,
                      java.lang.String hostname,
                      java.lang.String processname,
                      java.lang.String suitename,
                      long timestamp,
                      TestListener listener,
                      java.io.File filename)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                             org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException
notify indexer that a test suite has started

Parameters:
suite - test suite
hostname - host starting the tests
processname - process of the tests
suitename - name of the suite
timestamp - when they started
listener - who is listening to it
filename - the file being created
Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException - SmartFrog trouble
java.rmi.RemoteException - In case of network/rmi error
